colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,(CES BYAD MA 'BUM BZLOG PA'I BSRUNG 'KHOR BYA TSUL 'DI NI, RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO SHRI T'I BAm KAR RA SHRI DZNY'A NAS MDZAD CING, BOD KYI LO TZTSA BA BYAMS PA SHES RAB KYIS BSGYUR CING ZHUS TE GTAN LA PHAB PA LAGS SO, ,BSHES GNYEN DAM PA MANG PO LA BRGYUD NAS BDAG LA TSUL KHRIMS DPAL BZANG PO LA'O, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
